GENERAL.friends.request.receive.de-DE:
[grey]Du hast eine [blue]Freundschaftsanfrage von [blue][player] erhalten!
[green][ANNEHMEN] - [red][ABLEHNEN]
GENERAL.friends.request.receive.en-US:
[grey]You have received a [blue]friend request from [blue][player]!
[green][ACCEPT] - [red][DENY]

ERROR.friends.request.notsent.de-DE: [grey]Du hast [blue][player]</color> [red]keine</color> [blue]Freundschaftsanfrage</color> gesendet, die du zurückziehen könntest!</color>
ERROR.friends.request.notsent.en-US: [grey]You have [red]not</color> sent a [blue]friend request</color> to [blue][player] that you could revoke!</color>

ERROR.friends.request.receive.de-DE: [grey][blue][player]</color> hat dir [red]keine</color> [blue]Freundschaftsanfrage</color> gesendet, die du annehmen könntest!</color>
ERROR.friends.request.receive.en-US: [grey][blue][player]</color> has [red]not</color> sent you a [blue]friend request</color> that you could accept!</color>

GENERAL.setting.notify.join.enable.de-DE: [grey]Du wirst nun [blue]benachrichtigt</color>, wenn ein [blue]Freund</color> den Server [green]betritt!</color></color>
GENERAL.setting.notify.join.enable.en-US: [grey]You will now be [blue]notified</color> when a [blue]friend</color> joins the [green]server!</color></color>
